name: Loopman
description:
Loopman Goal

Break the loop by entering the Portal!!

Controls

In planing mode you can use these keys to write instructions to the execution sequence

  • A - go left
  • D - got right
  • W - jump
  • X - attack
  • Enter - run lopped execution

In the execution mode you can WATCH how Loopman try to escape the level in while(true) loop.
